achievements.name: First Steps
achievements.description: Enter the test arena for the first time

achievements.name: First Blood
achievements.description: Deal damage to an enemy for the first time

achievements.name: Combo Novice
achievements.description: Complete a full 3-hit combo chain

achievements.name: Heavy Hitter
achievements.description: Land a heavy finisher attack

achievements.name: Tactical Mind
achievements.description: Enter tactical mode for the first time

achievements.name: Spell Slinger
achievements.description: Cast an ability for the first time

achievements.name: Fire Starter
achievements.description: Hit an enemy with Fire Bolt

achievements.name: Ice Cold
achievements.description: Hit an enemy with Ice Arc

achievements.name: Lightning Rod
achievements.description: Hit an enemy with Lightning Thrust

achievements.name: Rising Star
achievements.description: Hit an enemy with Rising Blade

achievements.name: Wind Walker
achievements.description: Use Wind Step to dash through the battlefield

achievements.name: Iron Guard
achievements.description: Activate Guardian Rune shield

achievements.name: Full Arsenal
achievements.description: Use all 6 abilities at least once

achievements.name: Lock-On Master
achievements.description: Lock on to a target and switch between enemies

achievements.name: Dodge Artist
achievements.description: Avoid damage using dodge i-frames

achievements.name: MP Drought
achievements.description: Attempt to cast an ability with insufficient MP

achievements.name: Camera Commander
achievements.description: Rotate the camera to all 4 cardinal directions

achievements.name: Dummy Destroyer
achievements.description: Defeat all 3 test dummies in the arena

achievements.name: Combo Master
achievements.description: Reach a 10-hit combo count

achievements.name: Untouchable
achievements.description: Defeat an enemy without taking any damage
